scripts.test:basic: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_basic_report.json dist/tests/basic-load-test.js && npm run report:html
scripts.test:api: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_api_report.json dist/tests/api-validation-test.js && npm run report:html
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_stress_report.json dist/tests/stress-test.js && npm run report:html
scripts.test:checkout: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_checkout_report.json dist/tests/checkout-performance-test.js && npm run report:html
scripts.test:all: npm run test:basic && npm run test:api && npm run test:stress && npm run test:checkout
scripts.test:json: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_report.json dist/tests/basic-load-test.js
scripts.test:csv: npm run build && k6 run --out csv=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_report.csv dist/tests/basic-load-test.js
scripts.test:multiple: npm run build && k6 run --out json=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_report.json --out csv=reports/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)_report.csv dist/tests/basic-load-test.js && npm run report:html
scripts.report:html:all: for file in reports/*_report.json; do [ -f "$file" ] && node scripts/html-report-generator.js "$file" "reports/$(basename "$file" .json)_custom.html" "$(basename "$file" .json | sed 's/_report//')"; done
scripts.test:with-custom-report: npm run test:basic && npm run report:html
